Refunds by law: In Australia, consumers have a legal right to obtain a refund from a business for goods purchased if the goods are faulty, not fit for purpose or don't match description. More information at Solutions Medical offers 100% Money Back Guarantee if any product is found to be faulty, or complete exchange if stock is available. The Buyer will be reimbursed for any Postage charges incurred if it is found that the goods are faulty. Goods must be returned for verification in there original packaging and condition. Return policy details The buyer is responsible for return postage costs. Money Back 7 days after the buyer receives it Refund will be given as Item must be returned within Return policy
